short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is a simple tool to help you automatically comment other peoples' posts to increase exposure and gain more followers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
▬▬▬▬▬▬ FEATURES ▬▬▬▬▬▬ 
Comment and like by hashtags on Instagram.
Comment and like by locations on Instagram.
Comment and like by feed on Instagram.
Comment and like by anyone's followers on Instagram.
Comment and like by anyone's followings on Instagram.
Spin syntax & random comments.

▬▬▬▬▬▬ Get started ▬▬▬▬▬▬
1. Click the extension icon.
2. Create a comment task and add some subtasks to this task.
3. Configure comment type, number of comments and interval time for subtasks.
4. Run the task. You can open the extension at any time to check the progress.

▬▬▬▬▬▬ Notice ▬▬▬▬▬▬
- The bot do not require your IG password.
- Mass or frequent comments might get restricted by IG, use it at your own risk.

▬▬▬▬▬▬ Support ▬▬▬▬▬▬
